website_summaries.verdict: The i4 Goggle is highly customizable, comfortable, and sturdy, making this a premium paintball mask that professionals and newcomers alike will appreciate.
pros: Design whisks sweat from wearer’s face
cons: While the i4 is a comfortable and well-protected paintball mask, it is one of the pricier models out there

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: pros It’s a solid mask won’t break Many lens options Fits tight to face Foam is soft and dries up sweat fast Ready for a GoPro Cons Runs a little small on lower part so if you open your mouth you chin is exposed Overall it’s an amazing mask but if you prefer something a little bigger and wider get the dye i5s
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas g.

customer_reviews.title: If you are a serious player this should be your every day wear it's so comfortable, light
customer_reviews.text: Ok yes they are 129 dollars, THEY ARE WORTH IT! If you are a serious player this should be your every day wear it's so comfortable, light, and I played 5 hours sweating like crazy and didn't have to defog a single time! I was so happy! Also come on there are intimidating af, and everyone will be jealous of how good you look!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that doesn't fog
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, especially for a casual airsoft player like myself. That being said, it looks awesome and does not fog up, even in the humidity and heavy breathing associated with playing in the swamps of Mobile, Alabama in 100 degree weather. Visibility is a little lacking because of the tint, but I may replace the lens in the future. Mainly bought for the positive reviews about the fogging and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: russell

customer_reviews.title: What’s the hype all about though, seriously?!?
customer_reviews.text: Cool mask. I would say it’s way overpriced but still solid. Bought one to see what the hype was all about. Not overly impressed. Still needed some head gear to prevent fogging. So that anti fog stuff is a load of BS. In my opinion anyways, I play CQB Airsoft. For the price the mask should come with interior wiper blades or at least a cloth to clean the lens. Like C’mon now. I can’t be the only one thinking this lol. Protection is solid. Chin strap could be a lot better also. I personally wouldn’t spend anything over $110 for these mask. Unfortunately bought this mask brand new, but could’ve probably gotten one used and been just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Th4tBl4ckDude

customer_reviews.title: Decent but expensive mask
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Didn't fog in 80+ degree heat for over 4 hrs. of play, extremely lightweight, very wide view angle helps peripheral vision spotting Cons: Small mask, very limited throat protection, no visor = sunburn on forehead and head. Other people have mentioned workarounds for the lack of a visor, and you can try to wear a hat backwards, then put on the mask to sort of cover your head but this may or may not be comfortable to you.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Scheff

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: These are a game changer. After spending easily as much on other "fog proof" goggles i broke down and ordered myself and son each one of these. They are amazing. Playing in central Florida with alot of humidity there is no fogging issues at all. The fov is awesome. They protect you from ear to ear and all of your face. Wish i would have just bought these from the start and avoided all the aggrevation of the other goggles.
customer_reviews.author: David Myers

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Recently went airsofting and had this on, and it saved my eye. An unsupervised kid was waving his airsoft gun around in the safety area and shot me point blank in the face by accident, just under my eye. Thankfully I still had this mask on so there were no injuries suffered. I did give the kid and his parent a lecture about gun safety though! Phew - close call.
customer_reviews.author: E. Malia

customer_reviews.title: Mask Looks Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love going paint balling and I’ve tried mask after after. I decided to try this mask and it work flawlessly. ANd it looks amazing at the same time. Best way to use it is to wear a backwards hat with it for complete coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dye is the best for people who wear glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet looking mask. My teenage son loves this for playing airsoft, we've had trouble finding a good mask for him since he wears glasses. Good protection of face, eyes, and ears. Need a good shemag for neck protection.
customer_reviews.author: Roger DeTorres

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It doesn't cover as much as my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It doesn't cover as much as my old mask, but it has a great view. I have no complaints. just wear something to cover your head, I use armagillo dreads which are perfect for this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort an fit.  Never fogs love this mask.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit. Extremely comfortable compared to jt cheaper mask or any rental I've used. Great view played in damp weather an no fogging at all. Will buy another for my son who also plays. Worth the fit an comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Week made, great eye protection
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Great eye protection and you can see extremely well with this mask. Would definitely recommend to serious paintballers
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Wonder brand and a wonderful mask 😱
customer_reviews.text: First mask I bought and I wanna say it was worth every penny 😁 stunning and just jaw dropping, 1. Lots of breathing ports 2. Great for small headed people 3. Great look 4. Easy cleaning 5. Great feel 6. Easy to change lense
customer_reviews.author: Christopher soto

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Lens scratched after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and used it one time. I found a deep scratch as i was cleaning it tonight. Thats quite shocking since i wasn't hit in the mask by a paintball. I don't get how it was this easy to scratch. Cannot imagine how long this will last before i need to replace it. Otherwise its a really stylish and cool looking Goggle.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Fong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is extremely clear and VERY comfortable plus it looks awesome! But I didn't pay $130 for something that looks "awesome"...I paid $130 for something that works extremely well. It's well made and does not fog up. I used it for 4 hours the other day and not once did it give me any problems. The only minor complaint...it barely covers my jaw line and it does sit low...you'll definitely want to wear a hat or some sort of protection for your forehead. It's well worth the money. I'd recommend this mask to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Buy some spray to clean it on the field
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. It works good in the sun as well. Never had a problem with it fogging up either
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! What are you waiting for? JUST DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask! If your thinking of buying this Mask. You should just do it. I play alot of Airsoft in all types of weather. This mask has not once fogged up. Which keeps me at the top of my game.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lister

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what Voodoo/ Witch craft was used but Zero Fogging?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Zero fogging on a long 99deg muggy day! I used to run a proto and loved it. This is the best mask I've had, hands down. Totally worth the cash!
customer_reviews.author: James Turner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many mask and finally broke down and picked this one up. All the others would fog up completely this one fogged up very little and I mean very little. The field of view was amazing. You do need a headband or a hat to cover your forehead from getting hit. I wasted a lot of money buying all the other mask when I should of gotten this one from the start, I would of saved more in the long run......
customer_reviews.author: DevilDoc

customer_reviews.title: See the game, not google fog or edges!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Field of view, no fogging at all. Even in humid conditions, mask stayed perfectly clear. Easy to clean using water alone (don't use chemicals as it may damage the coating on the lens!). Highly recommended. Price is high, but Dye has always made quality equipment. I can't ask for a better mask! The black and gold adds an awesome touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Get an i5
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mask. I wish I did more research though because wearing glasses with this is downright painful. Also, spend the extra money and buy an i5... it's unbelievably better.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shade

customer_reviews.title: Dogs up severely
customer_reviews.text: I rated it low because it fogged right up and didn’t stop. I couldn’t see to play and had to leave the field. I have had Dye masks before and all had no problems until now!!! What a shame i am disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lynn Terry

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars because I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because I love this mask, but honestly I contemplated giving it 4. I switched from a proflex to the I4 and I have to admit the Proflex is more comfortable, covers your head better, has better breathability, aka is a better MASK. However I couldnt get over how cool the dye i4 looks, so i picked up a couple headbands and some neck protection and its all good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Great craftsmanship will worth the money. Packed very well and even has its own carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: way better than rental helmets because they do not fog
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, way better than rental helmets because they do not fog! :D Invest in this is you like to paint ball.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Airsoft
customer_reviews.text: My Dye mask has worked fantastically, no fogging in this mask where my last "fogless" goggles fogged constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Firth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s a little expensive I thruthfully think this is a $60 product but I have no complaints as of yet!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I definitely recommend. It's light and comfortable and doesn't fog.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan nace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I love it.. but it won't protect you from lasers pointers..
customer_reviews.author: Bronco

customer_reviews.title: Very happy w/ this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w/ this product. I wear a salem mask from army of two. Not paintball Legal though. But this mask fits comfortably n is legal paintball wise. So extremely Happy. Thank u amazon n dye for makin this happen. Let the bodies hit the floor Lol. Product is very light weight, flexible, durable... just overall awesome. I recommend It n love it. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Guerreo III

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is comfortable and crystal clear. No fogging, no pressure points or areas. Protects entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Parks

customer_reviews.title: The foam padding around the lens acts as a sweatband which is good but will eventually cause a drop or two to ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few weeks now. Absolutely no fogging. They are actually so clear that sometimes a glare will come across the lens. The foam padding around the lens acts as a sweatband which is good but will eventually cause a drop or two to get on the lens. I have quite a large head and these fit very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fecteau

customer_reviews.title: Great mask I've played in it for over 200 hours
customer_reviews.text: Over 200 hours of play and no wear and tear nor has it fogged up so all in all it's a great mask
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the thing, great for airsofting which is what i use it for, but indoors would reccomend a non tinted visor
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Fits will and looks sick. The only small complaint ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits will and looks sick. The only small complaint is that the visor isn't tinted as I thought it would be based on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W

customer_reviews.title: NEVER FOGS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing great mask with lots of adjustable places fits my 12 year old perfectly and it NEVER FOGS EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: The best mask available.
customer_reviews.text: I bought in fact 2 of these, one for me and one for my partner. It is very hard to fog it... happened only one time, and it was in a dense jungle environment (i live in Costa Rica) and i was sweating like crazy. It has great vision range. Good piece definately.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Shot in face
customer_reviews.text: Really work, took it to the field with a couple of buddys. I was hiding right around the corner, peek my head and BOW! Right on the left eye of the mask. Does its job of proecting your face
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Magana Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best paintball mask i've ever had. Low profile, light weight. Doesn't move around when running, and doesn't fog up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fits little smaller for big face but 4 me it exactly how I wanna
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality Mask
customer_reviews.text: I just got this mask and I love, it's comfortable, no fog, and the lens are clear. It's perfect for airsoft or paintball.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: okay mask
customer_reviews.text: its a great mask, just be aware that it doesnt cover your forehead completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Bee

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing mask, it is very light and makes you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mask, it is very light and makes you wonder why you did not get one sooner. It will not fog no matter how hard or long you are playing with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask
customer_reviews.text: was a little mislead by the picture because the lens is actually clear, not tinted. maybe i should have read more into the details and missed it.. otherwise, its a good mask.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Extremely great
customer_reviews.text: The difference between this mask and anything else is absurd. If you play airsoft or paintball and you're considering it, for your own sake get it.
customer_reviews.author: Armin

customer_reviews.title: By FAR the BEST mask.  Period.
customer_reviews.text: Where to even begin- it fits SO well to your face, it looks AMAZING, and it is the only mask to not ever fog up on a cold and rainy day this fall when we were playing. The top of your head will be exposed, so I recomend buying a skull cap of some sorts, but this mask is the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: jP

customer_reviews.title: Shows some chin and exposes you forehead but never fogs which is why I got them so I'm happy because those are 2 easy fix
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little small around the face. Shows some chin and exposes you forehead but never fogs which is why I got them so I'm happy because those are 2 easy fix. Just wear a cap/hat and a neck guard or veil scarf
customer_reviews.author: Simque Salaam

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for anyone who's in to paintballs or air-soft. The mask is great and looking awesome, it will make you like a bad ass. I'm very happy with my mask, little bit expensive though if u have the money go for it, u won't regret to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom N

customer_reviews.title: Also breathes much better than it looks like it should
customer_reviews.text: Range of vision is vast, and crystal clear. No muffeling of sound despite the close to the ear fit. Also breathes much better than it looks like it should. The only complaint I have is that my chin is a little more exposed than I would like, but haven't been hit there yet! VERY good mask, would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rother

customer_reviews.title: Best mask in my opinion....
customer_reviews.text: Gives great fitment and comfort. Lots of airflow and ventilation. No issues with fogging or condensation. Can buy replacement lens of just about any color tint or HD. If you can justify the price then I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Chafner_0711

customer_reviews.title: Best mask for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: Pros Doesn’t fog Ear protection Breathable Looks good Cons None
customer_reviews.author: josh rampy

customer_reviews.title: Non fogging!
customer_reviews.text: These work great they have not fogged once since getting them been in a few airsoft matches best investment I've made on mask
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection & Anti-Fog
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for airsoft, its a great mask and hasn't even remotely fogged yet. The only downside is that the foam soaks up sweat (Which is its purpose, to help prevent fogging) but you can dry it out by squeezing a towel against it for a moment.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hlavac

customer_reviews.title: By far the best mask I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This mask hugs your face. if you're worried about investing in this product, it is well worth it. By far the best mask I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bethzaida Halfhide

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: still kind of fogs up for me despite all the hype about these masks
customer_reviews.author: FreshOutTheBox

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: To address any potential size concerns, I have a larger than average head and haven't had any issues with this mask. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good goggle
customer_reviews.text: The lens on the goggle are very good, in hot or cold climate the lens stays clear and it is also scratch resistant. The goggle is very easy to wear and feels confortable, it's also light so it won't be in the way. The only thing that i didn't like is that the shipping took about a week more than expected.
customer_reviews.author: ISAXO

customer_reviews.title: This mask is probably the best mask I will ever use
customer_reviews.text: This mask is probably the best mask I will ever use. I had an old one that always fogged up and the lens scratched super easily. The Dye I4 is easy to put on and adjust to the size of anybody's head. If you are looking for a good mask that holds up to its name I would buy this one time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: yoloman24

customer_reviews.title: Best paintball mask I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, I can't recommend it enough. The field of view is amazing, you can see everything, and it sits very close to your face, so it's not bulky and obnoxious like most other masks. Yes, it costs a lot, but it's well worth it. WELL worth it. You should see the box they put this thing in. It felt like a crime to throw it away it was so elegantly packaged. The only downside is that there is a very good amount of glare in the visor, making it hard to see if the sun is in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MuNaught

customer_reviews.title: Really noiiice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how comfortable it is and how it perfectly outlines you head ass only the top can be shot
customer_reviews.author: Daily

customer_reviews.title: Best Mask I've used
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable NEVER FOGS even in cold weather Light Can sight my airsoft rifle pretty easy Only bad thing is the white reflects in my FoV. Not a huge problem, just slightly annoying. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again from them.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting a pre opened like display mask the box was pre opened. It has multiple scratches and like worn wareness. It’s got scratches and dust on the front of mask where mouth breathes from. The blue is faded out like it was on display for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jason santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, Huge Visual field, and does not fog up, I went as far as to go hiking while wearing it to see if it would fog up during the hike, but it stayed Clear the entire time, I am very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rodd

customer_reviews.title: Fat kid approved
customer_reviews.text: I love it fat kid friendly. Everyone on the field loves them too
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: The only mask you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: For clarity and no fogging what-so-ever, this is the mask you need. They say it's small, and it is true, there is a bit more exposed with the short sides, but comfort and clarity make up for that. I won't wear anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T Millard

customer_reviews.title: Master Chief look? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: The Dye i4 is already a great mask and writing about a winning design over and over again is moot. HOWEVER, the amazingly awesome look of the black and gold makes this mask 10x more appealing to me. It's a great fit, easy to see and breathe out of and is fairly intimidating. I'm very happy with it and now have to update my marker in order for it to match the the fear created by the black and gold. :P
customer_reviews.author: Swijr

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mask for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son said it doesn't fog while playing airsoft. Fits nicely and is comfortable. You can be heard by others while talking. Absolutely his favorite mask!
customer_reviews.author: cfountain94

customer_reviews.title: This is a FANTASTIC goggle! I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC goggle! I absolutely love it! My vocabulary can't portray my love of this goggle. Get it now!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisCope94

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a girl with a smaller frame, it fits perfect. Looks rad!
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Penticost

customer_reviews.title: Will improve your game.
customer_reviews.text: Lenses produce a glare, but I think I'm getting used to it. They look awesome though, and it fits amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Eckdahl

customer_reviews.title: To dye for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give 5 stars due to it being lightweight almost to almost noticing that it is on, it gives a wide view and very comfortable, I will say it is small it barely overs my face and I'm 5'5 145 lbs so prolly wouldn't recommend for the bigger guys as it won't cover your chin line, after doing a couple of 400 meter sprints it does not fog up at all,,, BIG PLUS it feels very durable and comfy which all in all I give it 5 out of 5!!
customer_reviews.author: chapa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit, breathes well and doesn't fog up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit, breathes well and doesn't fog up. It's also a work of art which is a nice plus, everything you want in a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best mask ever
customer_reviews.text: Best mask ever. If you're a true paintballer get this mask. If you're worried about getting shot in the neck, go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Zip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. Doesn't fog. Easy to take apart and clean.Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I now use it as an extra should my goggle break.
customer_reviews.author: sajuukdeath

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE LOOK AND FEEL OF THIS PB MASK. LIGHT AND EASY TO REMOVE GLASS. ITS QUITE EXPENSIVE THOUGH. 4 STAR CAUSE OF THE PRICE BUT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M. Alegria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, out the box it fit perfectly and looks really cool. I'm all about looks and this is a really sturdy and durable mask. I dont know how the finish will hold just yet but hopefully it wont get too scratched up
customer_reviews.author: Deathofwar

customer_reviews.title: DYE I4 SPECIAL EDITION PAINTBALL MASK
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME BEST MASK IVE EVER OWNED, I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE, NO TUNNEL VISION I HAVE FULL BROAD VIEW OF THE FIELD IT WAS WORTH EVERY PENNY...
customer_reviews.author: ruben

customer_reviews.title: good mask for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: Used for airsoft in Florida in July without fogging. Good view, light fit. Chin strap is pictured in manual with pad but mine did not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Pandis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing I had it for a for a year no ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I had it for a for a year no problem with it and it amazing if thinking of getting it get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped lens
customer_reviews.text: This may not go for all masks but mine was warped in several places and makes a noticeable difference. For $150 mask I expect the quality to be better than my $20 basic JT mask.
customer_reviews.author: MrCheesyPotato

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, the shipping of this product was very good and the quality is also very good. Delivery was good.
customer_reviews.author: Dario Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest looking mask I have owned. My one concern was it would be too dark, it is pretty dark but I adjusted quickly. I was playing outside in a heavy wooded area and could see fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Best paintball mask out there!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mask! I use mine for airsoft so don't know how it works for paintballing.. but I never have no problem with fogging or breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Guillen

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved these goggles
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these goggles. Used them immediately during a paintball frenzy and felt totally protected but way cool at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Cooper

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: their colors are perfect, the color of the lens is ideal, has a very good finish the goggle, is my favorite mask Victor Glorioso
customer_reviews.author: victor glorioso

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this many times for paintball battles and loves it. It's comfortable, keeps him protected, and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: SBGAL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, one of the best around, one of the best masks money can buy. Recommend for sure for everyone looking for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, padding seems a little cheap but other than that no fogging issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for paintball!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a variety of outdoor activities in the cold midwest winter. It works *great* for cycling around town, the giant field of view gives me plenty of peripheral vision, I get plenty of air, and my ears are kept pleasantly warm. I also use it when hiking in the woods and the full-face protection from branches is really a bonus. I have never had any issues with fogging, even when I used it in 50 degree f. weather. The build quality is very high and they did a great job packaging it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its Perfect!!!!!!!!! i used it in 3 matches and didn't fog up once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask for me
customer_reviews.text: I have an average size head and have tried a few different masks but wasn't happy until I got this one. It's comfortable, fits snugly against my head, lightweight, and just a good looking mask. I have already suggested this mask to friends.
customer_reviews.author: C. Voorhees

customer_reviews.title: be careful to clean paint from matches out after the ...
customer_reviews.text: be careful to clean paint from matches out after the day. Paint will effect the lens causing slight bubbling ruining the lens
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Never fogs up and it's easy to clean. Looks awesome as well. Pick yourself up one if you have the money.
customer_reviews.author: WMan

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is phenomenal. Excellent field of view, light weight, yet sturdy design. Rarely fogs and it looks menacing! :)

product_meta.title: Dye Precision I4 Thermal Paintball Goggle
product_meta.description:
The Dye Precision i4 Goggle System is the smallest profile, lightest, and best field of vision goggle system available. The thermal lens leads the industry in optical clarity and provides a distortion and fog free field of vision regardless of weather. Dye's proprietary dual stage foam combines open and closed cell foam technology. Dual stage foam is specifically designed to 'sheet' sweat and moisture away from your face, providing an undeniably resilient boundary between your eyes and perspiration. The i4 features an industry first compound radius lens with thermal technology, giving the player the ultimate vertical/ horizontal peripheral vision.

It also has a revolutionary patent pending rapid lens change system, allowing lens changes in ten seconds or less. It is as simple as pushing on each interior tab arm and then sliding them forward, instantly freeing the i4 lens for replacement.

Its precise blade angling and proven venting configuration allow heat and moisture to dissipate quickly. Scream Multi-Directional Venting makes communication with teammates effortless by carrying your voice farther.

Tiger Teeth buckles allow you to adjust your Invision woven rubber strap for a custom fit. Tiger teeth are designed to bite down and secure the strap during rigorous competition.
feature_bullets: The Dye Precision i4 Goggle System is the smallest profile, lightest, and best field of vision goggle system available. The thermal lens leads the industry in optical clarity and provides a distortion and fog free field of vision regardless of the weather.

The anatomically correct i4 mask system offers the best in comfort for all facial contours. The i4 is tested at twice the current impact ASTM and CE standards. Dye's proprietary dual stage foam combines open and closed cell foam technology.
The i4 sets the industry standard for anti-fog technology. The thermal lens provides distortion-free optical clarity and a fog free field of vision regardless of weather.
Precise blade angling and proven venting configuration make the i4 breathable and comfortable during long days of play.
Ear protection is critical, but it does not need to be bulky. The i4 system features a compression formed earpiece that is soft, flexible, and extremely lightweight.
